original_text: Make thee an ark of gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make in the ark, and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch.
korean_text: 너는 고페르 나무로 너를 위하여 방주를 만들되 그 안에 칸들을 막고 역청을 그 안팎에 칠하라

sentences.original_text: Make thee an ark of gopher wood
rooms shalt thou make in the ark
and shalt pitch it within and without with pitch
